content.subject: Scraper complaint issue
content.body_text:
Dear Saad,


Good afternoon! How have you been recently? The SDS scraper blade we used, 35*0.2, has issues as shown in attachment. 


Could you please help verify the cause of this problem and provide some advice?


Customer equipment: WH machine, printing width 2070mm,


Scra specifications: 35mm*0.2mm


Problem: When installed on the scraper cavity, the scraper blade bends, affecting the use of the scraper


Based on your understanding, can you determine the cause?


Looking forward to your reply, thank you!









 
Thanks&Best Regards

崔燕玲  Linda Cui

广州嘉琦印刷器材有限公司

Guangzhou Jiaqi Printing Supplies Co.,Ltd







Add：Tianhe District,Guangzhou Heguang Road Hexin Business Building,709 Room

Tel: 8620-85531113 

Fax:8620-85531183

Mobile Phone: 86 18011762574


E-mail: yanling@gakei.cn
content.body_html:
Dear Saad,

Good afternoon! How have you been recently? The SDS scraper blade we used, 35*0.2, has issues as shown in attachment. 

Could you please help verify the cause of this problem and provide some advice?

Customer equipment: WH machine, printing width 2070mm,

Scra specifications: 35mm*0.2mm

Problem: When installed on the scraper cavity, the scraper blade bends, affecting the use of the scraper

Based on your understanding, can you determine the cause?

Looking forward to your reply, thank you!





Thanks&Best Regards
